title: Fix Admin Add New Product modal background to solid white

requirements.summary: Replace the transparent/semi-transparent grey background of the 'Add New Product' modal with a solid white background in AdminDashboardPage.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Add New Product' panel/modal has a solid white background with no transparency.
Content behind the modal does not bleed through the panel.
All form fields (Name, SKU, Description, Price, Stock, Category, Image URL) are clearly legible against the white background.
The Cancel and Add Product buttons are clearly visible on the white background.

file_operations.description: Replace the modal/panel background class from transparent or semi-transparent grey (likely bg-gray-500/20, bg-gray-800/50, or similar) to solid white (bg-white) in the 'Add New Product' modal container div. Locate the modal wrapper element that contains the form fields and apply bg-white to ensure the form is clearly visible with no content bleeding through from the page behind it. Only modify the background stylingâ€”do not alter layout, form fields, buttons, or other functionality.
